origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenTechAPI.analyze_companies', 'description': 'This function analyzes specified green technology companies based on a list of company names and the type of data requested.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_list', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of company names to be analyzed.'}, {'name': 'data_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of data to be analyzed, e.g., financial, operational.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'An analysis report of the specified companies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenTechAPI.analyze_companies, 它的参数输入如下: 'company_list'是['CompanyA', 'CompanyB'], 'data_type'是'financial'.
